comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.854.0 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

A browser window which implements a toolbar with the chromeclass-toolbar class wont hide the toolbar when opened with the toolbar=no window flag.
comments.author: passfree@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.854.0 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

A browser window which implements a toolbar with the chromeclass-toolbar class wont hide the toolbar when opened with the toolbar=no window flag.

comments.creator: passfree@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: This sample app illustrates the problem. Btw, the bug is due to the usage of page element instead of window. In other words, if we use <window> instead of <page> everything works fine. This must be a stylesheet problem.
comments.author: passfree@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 560125
Sample Application

This sample app illustrates the problem. Btw, the bug is due to the usage of page element instead of window. In other words, if we use <window> instead of <page> everything works fine. This must be a stylesheet problem.
